title: Snap’s new ‘Pixy’ drone is built for Snapchat and costs $250
content:
Snapchat is still one of the top social media services, and its owner Snap has tried more than once to capitalize on that with limited-run hardware accessories. Snap has sold ‘Spectacles’ over the years that integrate with Snapchat, and now a new product is on the way: Pixy. Snap revealed in a press release, “we’re

The post Snap’s new ‘Pixy’ drone is built for Snapchat and costs $250 appeared first on XDA.
description: Snap Inc revealed a new compact drone called Pixy, which integrates with Snapchat and only costs $250 in the US.
